content: I have a girl: she’s 24 now. She’s turned out to be a smart, beautiful young lady with a good heart. You just do the best you can to teach them how to be a good person, and hope it makes a dent. One thing I do know: I limited TV and video games very early on, but the one thing I NEVER said no to was books. Best thing I ever did. She is still a voracious reader-reading is HUGE. It helps the brain develop the right way. Raising a child is the scariest, but also the most important thing I’ve ever done. I think you would be wonderful at it.
